summary: Brief professional summary describing your focus, strengths, and the value you bring. Keep this 3-5 sentences and results-oriented.

competencies.heading: Strategy & Operating Model
competencies.text: Product-led transformation; cross-functional pods; multi-year roadmap planning; continuous improvement.

competencies.heading: Portfolio & Investment Governance
competencies.text: Prioritization frameworks; benefits realization; roadmap → epic → work item traceability.

competencies.heading: Transparency, Data & Tooling
competencies.text: Jira/Azure DevOps taxonomy; KPI design; executive dashboards; data stewardship.

competencies.heading: Platform & Vendor Strategy
competencies.text: Platform rationalization; contract optimization; identity & access modernization (OAuth2/MFA).

competencies.heading: Metrics & Performance
competencies.text: Cycle time, velocity, cost per feature, SLA adherence; benchmarking & continuous improvement.

competencies.heading: Talent & Enablement
competencies.text: Capability taxonomy; coaching frameworks; succession readiness; high-performance culture.

bullets: Shifted teams to a product-led structure improving focus and delivery cadence.
Established unified tooling taxonomy and dashboards for portfolio visibility.
Introduced prioritization lifecycle from business case through benefits review.
Consolidated overlapping platforms to reduce redundancy and fund modernization.
Embedded throughput/cycle time KPIs into planning and review cadences.
Developed a capability taxonomy improving role clarity and growth paths.
